sentences.english: They had mysteriously found their way there from the wine cellar!
sentences.chinese: 這些酒瓶神不知鬼不覺地從酒窖離開了這裏。

sentences.english: Luzhou aged fermentation pit, built by yellow mud, is called "Jiujiao"(the pit for fermenting grains ).
sentences.chinese: 瀘州老窖是用黃泥建造的，稱爲酒窖。

sentences.english: The most interesting thing about Clos Fourtet was the vast underground wine cellars, among the finest in Bordeaux region.
sentences.chinese: 富達莊園擁有波爾多區最大的地下酒窖。

sentences.english: The Bodega has modern winemaking installations.
sentences.chinese: 該酒窖擁有現代化的釀酒設備。

sentences.english: Large wine cellar with constant temperature and humidity, keeps the most original flavor and sentiment.
sentences.chinese: 恆溫恆溼大型酒窖，鎖住最原汁原味的情懷。

sentences.english: They're building big houses and want a cellar.
sentences.chinese: 他們修建大房子，也希望有酒窖。

sentences.english: Implements the straight line management by the French Laina pasture wine cellar China office.
sentences.chinese: 由法國萊納牧場酒窖中國辦事處實行直線式管理。

sentences.english: You know, he had this big sort of show-off cellar.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，他有一個很大的值得炫耀的酒窖。

sentences.english: Related to delicacy, the cellar in the Otaru keeps its quiet popularity.
sentences.chinese: 作爲美食的近親，小樽的酒窖持續着安靜的人氣。

sentences.english: They had mysteriously found their way there from the wine-cellar!
sentences.chinese: 這些酒瓶神不知鬼不覺地從酒窖來到了這裏。

sentences.english: This is a medium-bodied wine suitable to drink now and will also cellar well.
sentences.chinese: 既適合酒窖內陳釀也可以現在飲用。

sentences.english: But have you considered extending your appreciation of the humble grape to a tour of the world's wine cellars?
sentences.chinese: 除了葡萄，你考慮過去瞧瞧世界上的酒窖嗎？

sentences.english: He constructed a wine cellar for himself.
sentences.chinese: 他爲自己建造了一個酒窖。

sentences.english: Compared with audio-visual room and underground wine cellar.
sentences.chinese: 地下則爲視聽室與酒窖。

sentences.english: To claim any knowledge of wine one must at least own a cellar.
sentences.chinese: 誰要說自己對葡萄酒有發言權起碼得有個酒窖。

sentences.english: They had mysteriously found their way there from the wine cellar.
sentences.chinese: 它們神不知鬼不覺地從酒窖來到了這裏。

definition: to brew/to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation
